cmp: 虫 (insect/worm, an animal/an invertebrate/a worm/an insect)
mng: category, genus (taxonomy), family members, dependents, to belong to, subordinate to, affiliated with, be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals), to be, to prove to be, to constitute
to join together, to fix one's attention on, to concentrate on

exm.mng: one's affiliation (i.e. the organization one is affiliated with), subordinate (i.e. those subordinate to oneself), belonging to, affiliated, under one's command
to be classified as, to belong to, to be part of
to be purely, pure and simple, sheer, outright
to belong to (a category), to be attached to
